admreg: East Asia and Pacific,East Asia and Pacific

abstracts.cdata!:
The proposed project consists of: (a)
            provision of equipment, materials, spare parts, and vehicles
            for rehabilitation and maintenance units; (b) provision of
            workshop equipment and tools to carry out field maintenance
            and repairs and to strengthen the capacity of base workshops
            to repair project equipment; (c) supply of survey, design,
            and office equipment required for the units; and (d)
            technical assistance to establish the units and assist with
            their operation; including costing, cost control and cost
            analysis of works, and the improvement of quality control
            and work planning.
